INSERT INTO store_pu_warehouse_stock( store_id, standard_unit_id, merchant_id, warehouse_id, real_stock_num, real_frozen_stock_num, pm_warehouse_priority, platform_id, store_product_unit_id ) VALUES

UPDATE store_pu_warehouse_stock
store_id = #{storeId},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
real_stock_num = #{realStockNum},
real_frozen_stock_num = #{realFrozenStockNum},
pm_warehouse_priority = #{pmWarehousePriority},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
store_product_unit_id = #{storeProductUnitId},
WHERE id = #{id}
